gist.headline: YouTube just got a syllabus
gist.blurb: Turn those endless video playlists into actual courses. Coursify joins the hive to help you learn with structure.
gist.summary: Added Coursify to the community showcase, a platform that converts YouTube playlists into structured courses with progress tracking.
gist.impact: Users can now discover a new tool for transforming unstructured video content into organized educational paths.
gist.visual_concept: Education theme. The bee mascot as a student or teacher. Transformation of video (TV/Play button) into knowledge (Books/Course).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny mortarboard hat, standing next to a retro TV monitor that is magically transforming into a stack of books. Lime green (#ecf874) magic sparkles around the transformation. Soft pastel library background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Pixel text: 'LEARN'. Emotionally warm and clever.
